name: Brain Boys
description:
Brain Boys is a two-player collaborative narrative with a fun combat system, set in frat boy Brian Chad McFreud’s head. Players control right or left brain to help Brian to make important decisions in his life in college. Will Brian gain success in academics, or will he win over his favorite girl? You will be the one to decide!   

The story is realistic and the visual style is cartoonish mixed with authentic stock images. 

Made by Selah Wright and Sy Suo.

Music from House Party.

Pictures from stock image websites.
